entries.npc_msn_03_decline: Oh my.  Well, I'll have to wait for someone else then...
entries.npc_msn_03_greeting_onothermission: Aren't you a little busy to be talking to me right now?
entries.npc_msn_03_friend_work_01: You should speak to my friend. There's work to be done, but it's far too dangerous for me!
entries.npc_msn_03_friend_greeting_onmission: Aren't you supposed to be helping my friend, here?
entries.npc_msn_03_greeting_onmission: I'm starting to lose my faith in you.  I understand you haven't finished that job we talked about...
entries.npc_msn_03_presp_getmission_04: You seem upset...can I help out?
entries.npc_msn_03_presp_getmission_03: No really.  I need some work.
entries.npc_msn_03_work_01: Sure you are...working against me, right?
entries.npc_msn_03_presp_getmission_02: Let's get started then.  What can I do for you?
entries.npc_msn_03_work_02: There might be something you can do...if I can trust you...
entries.npc_msn_03_busy_01: Don't act like you don't know!
entries.npc_msn_03_presp_greeting_01: Actually I'm looking for some work.
entries.npc_msn_03_greeting_01: Wait...who are you?  You're not with THEM are you?
